column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Thank you for taking the time to review Common Bond.  Our General Manager would like to reach out to you if at all possible to find out more about the situation and at least apologize for your experience.  We did not build our business on mediocre service no matter if it is a manager or a floor employee.  If you would not mind
column2: please private message us your preferred method of contact (email or phone number).   Thank you again for taking the time to review and let us know about your experience.
